com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility

Class LineStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.LineStyle

  • public final class LineStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the styling guideline information for the public transport line. All colors are in hex format.

    IMPORTANT: Urban Mobility is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

      • getTextColor

        public int getTextColor()
        Gets the text color that should get used when the line color is used as background color. See Color for more details on color format.
        Returns:
        text color or Color.BLACK if none

        public int getOutlineColor()
        Gets the color of the border around the line name. See Color for more details on color format.
        Returns:
        line border color or Color.TRANSPARENT if none
